title: Plain Sight
description: A stolen bride. A murderously protective groom. And a villain with the force of the entire justice system behind him.Putting a ring on it didn’t keep the outside world at bay for Jameson Hill. In fact, it’s brought all the sins of his past to his doorstep.Jameson he won’t rest until his bride is safe. And Lily’s grandfather won’t give up until Jameson is dead.There’s only one choice for Jameson to Vengeance or love?
author: Amelia Wilde
